data.eml:eml: Revision of the Zethus luzonensis species-group (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Selis, Marco (2017): Revision of the Zethus luzonensis species-group (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4232 (3): 444-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.3.13
